roleset.name: focused on, set apart as an individual
roleset.note: INDIVIDUALISTIC-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. (from individualistic.01-j)

example.text: When industry was individualistic, each man could make fifty things.

roleset.name: tailor to an individual
roleset.note: INDIVIDUALIZE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

example.name: individualize-v
example.text: These outcomes were achieved less by providing preventive services and strictly adhering to guidelines but rather by how-1 they individualized the management of new symptoms and chronic conditions *-1.
example.arg: the management of new symptoms and chronic conditions

example.name: individualized-j
example.text: But, as the degree is individualized, the length of time students need to develop their proposals will also vary widely.
